data.title: Menus – Blacks Pub, Whistler
data.meta_description: Browse our food and drinks menus …
data.text:
Guest $

Après Pass $

Slopeside Sunday

Sip an Aperol Spritz in the sun, enjoy a mouthwatering Veuve Clicquot mimosa by the mountains. Pair it with one of our prolific classic pizzas. 20% off on all the above, all day! ** Dolce Salty Pizza Excluded

Mountain Marg Monday

Try one of our delicious Margaritas for just $14 or bite into our authentic Margherita pizza for only $20!

Classic Margarita (2oz)

14.00

11.20

The Margherita Pizza

20.00

16.00

Tuesdays: Bellinis and Bites

Get a real taste of summer with our delicious frozen peach Bellini made with real fruit! {Perfectly paired with light, crispy Cauliflower Bites, for just $13.60 each!

Black's Bellini

13.60

10.88

Cauliflower Bites

13.60

10.88

Bandaoke Wednesday with The Groove Section

Join us from 9pm every week for Bandaoke - Karaoke with our live backing band, The Groove Section! Warm up those vocal chords with $12 double well spirits all day and get ready to screech like your heroes.

Thursdays: Sea to Sky Sangria

Our signature, delicious, fruity blend of red sangria, and our fluffy, salty pretzel bites are both 20% off all day

Red Sangria (6oz)

13.20

10.56

Pretzel Bites

14.40

11.52

Alpine Vines Friday

Ask your server for a recommendation on our rotating favourites, from British Columbia's finest and beyond

Summit Sips Saturday

Now Pouring: Veuve Cliquot by the glass! Enjoy our favourite bubbles while enjoying the breathtaking view of the mountains.

Veuve Cliquot (5oz)

45.00

36.00

Full English

25.00

20.00

Two perfectly cooked over easy eggs, Chorizo sausage, and crispy bacon, accompanied by sourdough toast with garlic butter, roasted cherry tomatoes, baked beans, and sautéed mushrooms. Served with hash browns. The classic.

Avocado Toast

21.00

16.80

Two pieces of fluffy sourdough generously topped with smashed avocado, finely diced red onion, tangy tomato jam, crumbled feta, and a sprinkle of green onions. Crowned with poached eggs and a touch of flakey salt. Served with hash browns. Vegan / Gluten Free options available.

Make it Vegan - Sub eggs for a Beyond Sausage and Feta for Vegan Cheese

5.00

4.00

The Black's Benny

23.00

18.40

A toasted English muffin, layered with garlic butter, sautéed spinach, red onion, and prosciutto, topped off with perfectly poached eggs and a luscious hollandaise sauce. Accompanied by golden breakfast hash browns. Vegetarian option available

French Toast

19.00

15.20

Black's Bulldogs

Guest $

Après Pass $

Aperol Spritz Bulldog (2oz + bottle)

28.00

22.40

A classic Italian cocktail known for its vibrant orange hue and refreshing taste, with a perfect balance of sweetness and bitterness. This light and bubbly cocktail is perfect on a warm, summers day! Double down on the bubbles with an upturned mini bottle of prosecco!

Royale Mojito Bulldog (2oz + bottle)

32.00

25.60

You can't find a more refreshing and minty drink than this classic Cuban cocktail! Enjoy a taste of the Caribbean with this vibrant and aromatic cocktail with a perfect balance of sweetness, acidity and herbal freshness. The mini bottle of Prosecco in the top brings that extra wave of freshness!

Margarita Bulldog (2oz + bottle)

28.00

22.40

A classic vibrant and zesty cocktail with the perfect balance of sweet, sour and salty flavors. The added bottle of corona in the top brings out that extra level of freshness!

Strawberry Daiquiri Bulldog (2oz + bottle)

28.00

22.40

Our vibrant pink cocktail with a smooth texture and refreshing taste, known for its sweet and fruity flavour. The sweetness of the strawberries, tartness from the lime and subtle kick from the rum gives you that simple taste of summer! These flavors are enhanced with a Smirnoff ice on top!

Pimms Cup Bulldog (2oz + Bottle)

28.00

22.40

A taste of British summer time - refreshing and perfect for warm weather! A mix of botanicals, fruits and spices create a delightful concoction that's fruity, herbaceous and slightly tangy... what better way to make it better than by putting a mini bottle of prosecco in the top?! Sit back and enjoy

House Favorites

Standing the test of time with our team and customers.

Guest $

Après Pass $

The Black's Bellini

17.00

13.60

It's back! Our home made, crafted mix of fresh mangos, peach schnapps, and lime, blended with prosecco, frozen and churned into a delicious slush. Perfect for that hot day cool-down!

Barrel-Aged Old FashionedUnavailable for now

25.00

20.00

A smooth-drinking classic with a twist. We take premium Deep Cove 7 year old Canadian Whisky, blend with bitters and demerara sugar, before letting it rest in our oak infusion barrel for a minimum of 30 days, where it develops an extremely smooth and velvety finish

Black's Signature Red Sangria

16.50

13.20

Quench your thirst with our house-made sangria - the perfect blend of red wine, spiced rum, peach schnapps and juice infusions.

Pimm's Cup

The timeless, classic blend of Pimm's sweet and herbaceous liqueur, with bubbly lemonade, fresh fruits, cucumber and mint.

CHAMPAGNE, Veuve Clicquot ‘Yellow Label’ Brut NV

Reims, France - A classic Champagne loved by the masses. Notes of toasted almonds, brioche and vanilla. An ample mouth and plenty of freshness.

5oz

45.00

36.00

750ml Bottle

225.00

180.00

PROSECCO, Zonin ‘Cuvee 1821’ Brut

Veneto, Italy - Zonin Prosecco reveals a persistent perlage and rich mousse. The bouquet is elegant, enhanced by green apples, lemons and limes. On the palate, the wine is dry and pleasantly fruity with flavours of almonds and fresh citrus notes.

5oz

15.00

12.00

750ml Bottle

75.00

60.00

PINOT NOIR, Bailly Lapierre Crémant de Bourgogne Rosé NV

Burgundy, France - Alluring scents of bing cherries and watermelon. The cherry flavours spill over to the palate where they are rounded out with elements of lemon-lime, dough, and nougat.

5oz

19.00

15.20

750ml Bottle

95.00

76.00

LAMBRUSCO, Medici Ermete 'Quercioli' Lambrusco di Sorbara Secco

Emilia-Romagna, Italy - Cheerful and charming, this a brisk and dry Lambrusco di Sorbara. Aromas of wild red berry, violet and citrus zest lead the nose. On the lively, lightly sparkling palate, racy acidity accompanies orange slice, strawberry and raspberry.

750ml Bottle

61.00

48.80

BLEND, Benjamin Bridge Brut NV

Nova Scotia, Canada - Bone-dry, this is the non-vintage flagship from sparkling-wine specialist Benjamin Bridge. Excellent depth, showing nutty, bready, toasty notes over fresh pear and lemon-lime soda, plus the electric acidity of a mouthful of microscopic spark plugs.

750ml Bottle

97.00

77.60

CHAMPAGNE, Dom Pérignon Brut 2012

Epernay, France - Incredibly complex nose of dried green apples, grapefruit pith, preserved lemons, toast, oyster shells, cloves, sourdough, salted caramel and quince. Layered, refined and so sleek, with salty minerality and a toasty edge to the dried citrus. Structured and tense, yet elegant and almost endless.

750ml Bottle

650.00

520.00

1.5L Magnum

1,300.00

1,040.00

CHAMPAGNE, Louis Roederer Collection 243 NV

Reims, France - Wine Spectator #76 wine of the Year! Aromas of cooked apple, bread dough and lemon tart follow through to a full body with round, delicious fruit and a rich, flavorful finish. Yet, it remains tight and fine with lovely, compressed bubbles. New energy and freshness. Medium-to full-bodied with layers of fruit and vivid intensity.

750ml Bottle

174.00

PINOT GRIGIO, Di Lenardo 2022

Friuli, Italy - Hand harvested, this Pinot Grigio is clean and bright with a pleasant array of aromas such as pear, citrus, apple and Acacia flowers. Mouth-watering acidity and a long finish.

Lillooet, BC - Vibrant and fresh, this Pinot Gris is bursting with citrus and tropical fruit notes of kiwi, lime, and grapefruit. This juicy and fruit-forward wine is perfect for any occasion. Pair this refreshing wine with mussels, white fish, or pasta with a cream sauce.

Marlborough, New Zealand - This leaps out of the glass, with expressive, intense fruit flavors of silky smooth lemon meringue, mango, tangerine and fresh-cut apple. Candied ginger and green tea notes join a detail of salted lime before lingering on the mouthwatering finish.

CHARDONNAY, Meyer Family Vineyards 2022

Okanagan, BC - This chardonnay is vibrant with white floral, citrus and lemon zest on the nose and the palate is clean and crisp displaying classic Okanagan peaches, yellow apples and crunchy pear. Aged in a combination of stainless-steel vessels (80%) and neutral French oak barrels (20%) for 6 months.

CHARDONNAY, Pascal Clement Meursault 'Les Narvaux' 2017

Burgundy, France - The 2017 Les Narvaux is showing beautifully, offering up aromas of citrus oil and crisp Anjou pear mingled with hints of beeswax and fresh butter. Medium to full-bodied, satiny but incisive, it's elegantly textural, with terrific depth and tension at the core, underpinned a racy spine of acidity that carries through the penetrating finish.

CHARDONNAY, Ramey 2019

Russian River Valley, USA - This Chardonnay is fresh, with a ripe, classic character of peach, toasted spice, and flinty reduction. The palate offers more concentration, with noes of green apple and pear, although it is driven with acidity.

750ml Bottle

196.00

BLEND, Stone Road 2022

Okanagan Valley, BC - Fresh fruit aroma of peach, melon, yellow apple, and golden kiwi, with an added floral note. This is a light-bodied, smooth yet refreshing white wine with an off-dry palate and flavours of Bartlett pear, sweet apple, tropical fruit, and sweet citrus.

BLEND, Sea Star 'Stella Maris' 2022

Pender Island, BC - The 2022 vintage of this flagship 'Star of the Sea' blend is organically grown Gewurztraminer, Pinot Gris, Schonburger, and Ortega. Fragrant lime and lime pith, melon, crisp green apple, rose petals streams along a slender, off-dry palate to a lingering finish - what aromatic white blends in BC should be.

BLEND, Whispering Angel 2022

Provence, France - Whispering Angel is credited with starting the international rosé trend. Very pale apricot-pink color. Delicate aromas of sliced apple, pink grapefruit, peach, cream and stones follow through to a medium body and crisp acidity. Deliciously creamy and smooth.

750ml Bottle

96.00

76.80

BLEND, Whispering Angel 'The Beach' 2021

Provence, France - Made from Grenache, Cinsault and Carignan, this authentic rosé from Provence operates as a playful, trendy, energetic “little sister” to Whispering Angel. The Palm is expressive both inside and out as it shows great aromatic freshness on the nose followed by more subtle, fruity notes on the palate. The colorful and playful label has been called “almost as perfect as the rosé itself”. Signed and approved by Whispering Angel.

Okanagan Valley, Canada - Hints of Kirsch cherries, cranberry jam, with hints of damp earth and mushrooms. Firm yet velvet tannins with bright mid palate acidity.

PINOT NOIR, DeLoach 2019

Russian River Valley, USA - This Pinot Noir opens with a bouquet of red fruit aromas including cherry, cranberry and strawberry. Juicy red fruit flavors are complemented by a touch of spice and hint of tobacco. Medium in body, this is a well-balanced wine with an elegant finish and pairs nicely with a variety of lighter dishes.

750ml Bottle

105.00

84.00

SANGIOVESE, Donna Laura ‘Ali’ 2020

Tuscany, Italy - Succulent dark cherry, plum, spice, leather and licorice are nicely pushed forward in a supple, silky red to drink now and over the next handful of years. Time in the glass brings out pretty cedar, tobacco and floral nuances.

750ml Bottle

65.00

52.00

MALBEC, La Posta 'Pizzella' 2021

Mendoza, Argentina - The 2021 Pizzella Malbec is aromatic, floral, varietal and harmonious. It's clean and juicy, with very fine tannins and a velvety and caressing texture.

BLEND, French Door 'Heritage' 2018

Okanagan Valley, BC - This is a bold red, with intense aromas of cassis, blackberry and black cherry. Flavours of blackberry and dark chocolate with a hint of tobacco and pepper. A silky smooth and long finish. Merlot, Cabernet Franc, Cabernet Sauvignon, Petit Verdot, Malbec.

750ml Bottle

141.00

112.80

BLEND, Argiano 'Solengo' 2018

Tuscany, Italy - An element of wild herbs graces the black currant and black cherry flavours in this robust red, which is firm and compact on the iron and tobacco tinged finish, with a sense of grace. Cabernet Sauvignon, Petit Verdot, Merlot and Sangiovese.

750ml Bottle

255.00

204.00

BLEND, Stone Road 2022

Okanagan Valley, BC - Aromas of cherry, currant, plum, and a touch of tobacco leaf. This medium-bodied red has a smooth, just off dry mouthfeel and flavours of red and black berries, with an added touch of spice. Juicy currant, blue plum, and cherry notes with a hint of black tea and spice linger on the finish.

MERITAGE, Mission Hill 'Compendium' 2012

Okanagan Valley, BC - The 2012 Compendium is distinctive, with black currant, Italian plum aromas and flavours up front, but also displays blackberry, wild herb and star anise notes. The balance of delicate and unique flavors of Zacapa No. 23 is derived from a blend of aged rums between 6 and 23 years old, originating from the “Sistema Solera” aging process. Zacapa No. 23 is aged in selected barrels that previously aged robust American whiskey, delicate sherries and fine Pedro Ximénez wines, creating a smooth & balanced rum. Zacapa No. 23 Rum is best served neat, on the rocks or in your favorite dark spirit cocktail.

Gin

Guest $

Après Pass $

Hendrick's

13.50

10.80

Hendrick's Gin is created via an absurdly inefficient, yet quite glorious process. In essence, to make one gin, they first create two. One on an old-fashioned pot still, yielding a rich and intricate spirit. The other on a long-necked Carter Head, producing a delicate, more refined spirit. Each still is infused with an unusual symphony of 11 botanicals: chamomile, elderflower, juniper, lemon peel, orange peel, caraway, coriander, cubeb berries, angelica root, yarrow root and orris root. The gins from the two stills are then married together and graced with curious yet marvellous infusions of Rose and Cucumber.

Matured twice in American Oak, Laphroaig Quarter Cask presents an irresistible doubling of flavor because the second maturation takes place in smaller, quarter-sized casks, the spirit has more contact with wood. The blend that fills Blue Label bottles must reach a minimum of 28-years-old, and some single-malts are as old as 60 years. Berry fruits, aniseed, hints of cedar, a touch of spice and citrus. An intriguing 12 year old whisky that’s Distilled Different.

Woodford Reserve

The art of making fine bourbon first took place on the site of the Woodford Reserve Distillery, a National Historic Landmark, in 1812. The perfectly balanced taste of this Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is comprised of more than 200 detectable flavor notes, from bold grain and wood, to sweet aromatics, spice, and fruit & floral notes.

Maker's Mark

12.75

10.20

This one changed the way everyone thinks of bourbon, all because one man changed the way he thought about making it. Bill Samuels, Sr, he simply wanted a whisky he would enjoy drinking. Never bitter or sharp, Maker's Mark® is made with soft red winter wheat, instead of the usual rye, for a one-of-a-kind, full-flavored bourbon that's easy to drink.

Clase Azul Reposado

39.00

31.20

Clase Azul Tequila Reposado is a symbol of Mexican tradition and culture. Made with slow-cooked 100% Blue Weber Agave, this ultra-premium reposado tequila is unique and incomparable. Clase Azul Tequila Reposado is masterfully aged for eight months in American whiskey casks imparting its unique hazelnut and vanilla flavors as well as its exceptionally smooth finish. ​

Casamigos Mezcal

24.00

19.20

Casamigos Joven Mezcal is produced in Oaxaca, Mexico by a 4th generation family of Mezcaleros using 100% Espadin agaves. Every one of the bottles is handcrafted using a unique process insuring no two bottles will ever be the same. Casamigos Mezcal is balanced and elegant, offering harmonious hints of tamarind, pomegranate, banana and mango. Fresh herbal mint aromas, dried oregano and thyme lend character to the mezcal. The delicate tones of smoke, hints of licorice and mineral nuances lead to a long silky finish.

Produced in small batches and aged for a minimum of two and a half years, Don Julio 1942® Tequila is handcrafted in tribute to the year that Don Julio González began his tequila-making journey.
